stadium.name: The Stronghold Bailey
stadium.description: The team plays in the central bailey of Stronghold Castle, a massive fortress built on a plateau overlooking the city. The field is packed earth and cobblestone, and the crowd watches from the surrounding stone ramparts.

stats.pregame_ritual: Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Searching for a four-leaf clover near the sidelines.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Sharing a piece of fermented fish with a teammate.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Eating a piece of honeycomb to 'sweeten' their victory.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Tugging on their left earlobe three times.
Seeing who on the team can belch the loudest.
Tying a red string around their pinky finger.
Sharing a piece of fermented fish with a teammate.

stadium.name: The Serpent's Pass
stadium.location: Zmeigorod, just west of the lumber mill
stadium.description: Has to be periodically rebuilt whenever the old stadium starts sinking into the swamp. Don‚Äôt worry about it.

stats.pregame_ritual: Rubbing a foul-smelling local mushroom on their elbows for flexibility.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Polishing their helmet with a live snail for good luck.
Tensing every muscle in their body at once, then releasing.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Looking each teammate in the eye and giving a single, firm nod.
Giving the Trollball a heroic backstory before each game.
Painting a single, matching stripe of mud on each player's face.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.
Performing a series of aggressive, theatrical poses.
Polishing their helmet with a live snail for good luck.

preGame:
# GOOD EVENING, TROLLBALL FANS! üéôÔ∏èüëπ

This is **Nok the Corrupter**, coming to you LIVE for another **TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL** spectacular! We are broadcasting from the high ramparts of **The Stronghold Bailey** in New Ravenfall! The air is thin, the drop is steep, and the field is made of packed earth and UNFORGIVING COBBLESTONE! It‚Äôs the perfect recipe for skinned knees and broken dreams! Ha ha ha!

Let‚Äôs meet our combatants! Visiting from the sinking swamps, we have **The Zmeigorod Snessengers**! üêç I was down in the locker room earlier and the smell was... memorable! I watched **Delija Dowling** chug a raw egg‚Äîshell and all! CRUNCHY! That‚Äôs the kind of calcium uptake I like to see! And their healer, **Waldon Tadeo**, was rubbing some foul mushroom paste on everyone's elbows. Let's hope that fungus helps them bounce off the pavement! They hail from the lands of **The Grove**, domain of the Bog Queen Valos and High Priestess Oona‚Äîthat woman who keeps executing my friends. BOO! Let's see if the Snessengers can slide their way to victory!

Defending the castle, it's **The New Ravenfall Commanders**! üè∞ These soldiers look ready for war! **Rhett Gavrilla** was seen collecting pebbles from the pitch‚Äîprobably to sharpen their axe with! And **Jozef Pepe** is leading a belching contest on the sidelines! CLASSY! They represent the faction of **Eponore**. You know, Sir Tanos the Bold and Artorias the Moonslayer? Those shiny, self-righteous "heroes" who think they‚Äôre better than us demons? Well, tonight, their team better be ready to get dirty!

Will the Commanders hold the fort? Or will the Snessengers swamp the competition? Grab a drink, lock your doors, and PRAY for overtime! **IT'S TROLLBALL TIME!**
postGame:
# AND THAT IS THE GAME! üèÅ

**FINAL SCORE: The New Ravenfall Commanders 1, The Zmeigorod Snessengers 0!**

Holy smokes, folks! It wasn't a high-scoring affair, but it was a BONA FIDE BRAWL! The Commanders turned The Stronghold Bailey into a torture chamber tonight! The pavement is stained red, and the healers are earning their paychecks!

The violence started early and NEVER STOPPED! **Dusa Curson** of the Commanders came out swinging like a maniac! Early in the first half, Dusa tackled **Alded Sanjay** and sent them straight to the mat with a CRACK! üöë But the Commanders weren't done! **Jessalin Zobias** laid a brutal hit on **Kleinstein MacGregor**, taking them out of the game! The Snessengers tried to respond, but their offense was sloppier than their swamp! **Delija Dowling** and **Gere Cordelie** both missed shots on goal! You can't win if you can't aim, folks!

**Jozef Pepe** kept the pain train rolling for Ravenfall, injuring **Arni Griffith** right before the break! The Snessengers' healer, Waldon Tadeo, had to use every mushroom in the bag to get those players back for the second half!

After halftime, the deadlock finally broke! **Jessalin Zobias**‚Äîwho was already having a killer game‚Äîsprinted into the End Zone and **DUNKED THE BALL** for a TOUCHDOWN! üèÄ That single point would prove to be enough!

But Dusa Curson wasn't satisfied with just one victim! In the second half, Dusa INJURED **Kleinstein MacGregor** (again!) and then took out **Rose Kluge** for good measure! THAT IS A HAT-TRICK OF HOSPITALIZATIONS! GIVE THAT DEMON A RAISE! üî•

The Snessengers managed one moment of defiance when **Rose Kluge** injured **Theis Loredo**, but it was too little, too late. **Croteau Osmo** added insult to injury by crushing **Dare Wynnie**, and **Alded Sanjay** threw a desperate pass that was picked off by **Pirozzo Opal** to seal the deal.

A masterclass in brutality from the New Ravenfall Commanders! Artorias and Tanos might be insufferable do-gooders, but their team knows how to HURT people, and I respect that! The Snessengers slither back to the swamp with a goose egg on the scoreboard and a lot of bruises! 

This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off! Remember: It's not about winning or losing, it's about how many bones you break along the way! GOODNIGHT OSTERRA! üåôüíÄ
